channel.title: Easy 1 click router tut
channel.description:
ok so ive been trying to get easy one click server files by xEnt up for public for over 5 hrs now.. (nerd) and i cant up them for public.. i can up them for 127.0.0.1 only ive portforwared it all and can run the divinepk for public easy(but who wants to lol) ive went into conf folder and changed the ips in there, ive tried no-ip. and ive even tried hamachi.. all failed :mad: i did notice that theres no world file in thease server files, is this the only place to change the ip?? and in client ofc..
<comment>Demonik Config</comment> <entry key="version">31</entry> <entry key="ip">216.245.211.162</entry> <<<<<<<<<<<< ive changed both of thease <entry key="port">43594</entry> <entry key="name">DemonikOnline</entry> <entry key="location">Dallas</entry> <entry key="maxplayers">800</entry> <entry key="servernum">3</entry> <entry key="lsip">10.1.1.145</entry> <<<<<<<<<<<<<< <entry key="lsport">34522</entry>
and why r those ips differnt.. 216 and the 10, ive tried putting my network ip in there and ive tried my external ip... ive even tried 1 of each both time... ive tried chainging the port nothing is working.. i just need help because i can host any other server files but thease ones.. and there the ones i like best that ive edited. some 1 please help me lol im going crazy... xEnt may b u messed up with the world file and none can get this on router?? oh and ive also turned off all fire walls and virus programs and still nothing.

item.title: Easy 1 click router tut
item.dc:creator: @beer123 beer123
item.description:
@beer123 wrote:

yes sir thank you alot xD

Read full topic

item.title: Easy 1 click router tut
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Look in server.java mate, change that ip to your 192.168 ip =]

Read full topic

item.title: Easy 1 click router tut
item.dc:creator: @beer123 beer123
item.description:
@beer123 wrote:

ok so ive been trying to get easy one click server files by xEnt up for public for over 5 hrs now… (nerd) and i cant up them for public… i can up them for 127.0.0.1 only ive portforwared it all and can run the divinepk for public easy(but who wants to lol) ive went into conf folder and changed the ips in there, ive tried no-ip. and ive even tried hamachi… all failed :mad: i did notice that theres no world file in thease server files, is this the only place to change the ip?? and in client ofc…

<comment>Demonik Config</comment>
<entry key="version">31</entry>
<entry key="ip">216.245.211.162</entry> <<<<<<<<<<<< ive changed both of thease
<entry key="port">43594</entry>
<entry key="name">DemonikOnline</entry>
<entry key="location">Dallas</entry>
<entry key="maxplayers">800</entry>
<entry key="servernum">3</entry>
<entry key="lsip">10.1.1.145</entry> <<<<<<<<<<<<<<
<entry key="lsport">34522</entry>

and why r those ips differnt… 216 and the 10, ive tried putting my network ip in there and ive tried my external ip… ive even tried 1 of each both time… ive tried chainging the port nothing is working… i just need help because i can host any other server files but thease ones… and there the ones i like best that ive edited. some 1 please help me lol im going crazy… xEnt may b u messed up with the world file and none can get this on router?? oh and ive also turned off all fire walls and virus programs and still nothing.
